code: @Override public void afterPropertiesSet() throws Exception {     PropertyMapper map = PropertyMapper.get().     String host = this.properties.getUriHost().     map.from(this.properties::getUriScheme).when((scheme) -> StringUtils.hasText(scheme) && StringUtils.hasText(host)).to((scheme) -> this.delegate.baseUri(scheme + "://" + host)).     map.from(this.properties::getUriPort).whenNonNull().to(this.delegate::port). }
